Oracle","details":"This contract allows users to: - Create data labeling tasks with ERC20 token rewards - Participate in tasks by labeling data - Distribute rewards to participants - Claim earned rewardsImportant: - The creator of the task can't participate in the task to receive rewards - Task are not deletable - Sending ETH to the contract is not allowed will revert // aware of case of self destruct - Any Erc20 token transfer without using the depositTokens function will be locked in the contract forever","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant params.taskId: ID of the task to claim rewards from

constructor.details: Reverts if token address is zero address

params._tokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 token to be used for rewards

params.deadline: Timestamp when the task expires atleast 3 hours from now
params.totalReward: Total reward amount for the task

params.amount: Amount of tokens to deposit in wei

distributeRewards(uint256).details: if there are no participants, the reward is returned to the creator

params.taskId: ID of the task to distribute rewards for
ID of the task to check rewards for
params.user: Address of the user to check rewards for

returns._0: Amount of tokens claimable as reward

getTasksByCreator(address).details: Returns a dynamically sized array containing only valid task IDs

params.creator: Address of the task creator to query

returns._0: Array of task IDs created by the given address

getTasksByParticipant(address).details: Returns a dynamically sized array containing only valid task IDs

params.participant: Address of the participant to query

returns._0: Array of task IDs the user has participated in

params.taskId: ID of the task to participate in

params._amount: the amount of tokens they want to withdraw in wei

claimReward(uint256).notice: Allows participants to claim their rewards

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with a specific ERC20 token

createTask(string,uint256,uint256).notice: Creates a new data labeling task

depositTokens(uint256).notice: Allows users to deposit tokens to their balance

distributeRewards(uint256).notice: Distributes rewards for a completed task

getClaimableReward(uint256,address).notice: Gets the claimable reward amount for a user in a specific task

getParticipants(uint256).notice: Gets list of participants for a task

getTaskIdToTask(uint256).notice: gets the TaskResponse for a taskId

getTasksByCreator(address).notice: Gets all task IDs created by a specific address

getTasksByParticipant(address).notice: Gets all task IDs that a user has participated in

getUserBalance(address).notice: Gets the token balance of a user

hasParticipated(uint256,address).notice: Checks if a user has participated in a task

performTask(uint256).notice: Allows users to participate in a task

withdraw(uint256).notice: Allows creator to withdraw their deposit
